title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), it can be observed that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around. However, these scrollbars do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
SR:
To reproduce this issue in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), follow these steps:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around.
3. Note that the scrollbars do not have any effect, even when opening a small image like an icon.
